name: Jack Rose
description: A potent mix of applejack, grenadine, and lemon juice flavored with a dash of Peychaud's bitters.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounces fresh squeezed juice from 1 lemon

recipeInstructions.text: Combine applejack, grenadine, lemon juice, and bitters in a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice and shake vigorously until well chilled, about 15 seconds. Strain into a chilled coupe or martini glass. Squeeze lemon twist over surface of drink, skin-side-out to release fragrant oils. Rub rim of glass with skin side of lemon twist and discard twist. Serve immediately.
